sentences.en: At the moment, the Rockets look like a pretty solid playoff team with a good future.

trans.tran_cn: （双方得分相等时的）最后决赛
trans.tran_en: A playoff is an extra game that is played to decide the winner of a sports competition when two or more people have the same score
